pr_title: Extracts MapExtra from BaggageFields and decouples tests

timeline.message:
Extracts MapExtra from BaggageFields and decouples tests

Before, all coverage of "extra" routed through BaggageFields.
Incidentally, it also used tracer when it didn't need to. This pulls
up `MapExtra` so that the concerns around maps are decoupled from
`BaggageFields`. This will allow us to reuse the bulk of the code in
trace-context format and secondary sampling.

timeline.body: you'll notice while the generics are a bit wild in the base type, the eventual result is fairly simple.
timeline.bodyText: you'll notice while the generics are a bit wild in the base type, the eventual result is fairly simple.

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
